pageProduct.name: Provoke Touch Of Silver Brightening Shampoo 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

To actively neutralise yellow or brassy tones, use this ultimate hair hero, PRO:VOKE Touch Of Silver Brightening Shampoo. Containing active violet pigment, this toning shampoo brightens hair colour in just ONE WASH for instant, visible results. Working on the principle of colour theory, it also treats colour fading and dullness, resulting in vibrant, dazzling shine.

Warnings

For External Use Only

Common Uses

Instantly enhances the colour and condition of grey, white or platinum blonde hair. Violet colour pigments actively neutralise brassiness and counteract yellowing, fading and dullness.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water/Eau), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates Copolymer, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Wheat Amino Acids, Polyquaternium-59, Panthenol, Cocamide Dea, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Betaine, Glycol Stearate, Disodium Distyrylbiphenyl Disulfonate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Trideceth-7, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride, Edta, Parfum (Fragrance), Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Potassium Sorbate, Magnesium Chloride, Acid Violet 43

Directions

Apply to wet hair and massage into a gentle lather. Leave in for 5 mins, then rinse thouroughly. Use 1-2 times a week for optimal results. Allow 2 weeks after a salon colour before using this product.
